description: This source file implements the advanced interface functions for a Web Service Plane object (Bwsp Site Creator). It includes functions to attach/detach web hosts and servlets, with detailed configurations for each. The code manages web host and servlet objects, setting properties and interfacing with a web helper module.

classes.name: PBWSP_SITE_CREATOR_OBJECT
classes.description: Pointer to the site creator object managing web hosts and servlets.

classes.name: PBWSP_SITE_CREATOR_PROPERTY
classes.description: Properties for configuring the site creator, including session timeout and cookie names.

classes.name: PBWSP_WEB_HOST_DESCRIPTOR
classes.description: Descriptor structure containing host details like host name, port, session tracking, and context.

classes.name: PBWSP_PORTAL_HOST_OBJECT
classes.description: Object representing a portal host, with methods to set properties and manage lifecycle.

classes.name: WEB_HELPPER_CONTAINER_OBJECT
classes.description: Container object providing HTTP helper functions.

classes.name: WEB_LSM_INTERFACE
classes.description: Interface for Web Session/State Management activities.

classes.name: PBWSP_SERVLET_DESCRIPTOR
classes.description: Descriptor for web servlets, including paths, context, and function pointers for HTTP methods.

classes.name: PBWSP_WEB_SERVLET_OBJECT
classes.description: Object representing a web servlet with configuration and lifecycle management.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwspScoWsrAttachWebHost(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hHostDescr)
methods.description: Attaches a web host (portal host object) based on provided descriptor, setting properties and registering with web helper.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwspScoWsrDetachWebHost(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * host_name)
methods.description: Detaches a web host identified by name from the web helper interface.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwspScoWsrAttachServlet(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * host_name,ANSC_HANDLE hServletDescr)
methods.description: Attaches a web servlet to a specified host, configuring properties and interfaces, and engaging its lifecycle.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwspScoWsrDetachServlet(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * host_name,char * path_name)
methods.description: Detaches a web servlet from a host based on host name and servlet path.
